page.title: 05Changes in the Meir area
page.content: Meir used to be a small village with only one major road and a very small population.During the last 40 years many changes have taken place in the area. The local pub-Kings Arms-was once a small country pub,the Community Centre was once a farm that had lots of birds and wildlife in the woods that surrounded it. One of the latest proposals is to construct a new By-pass through the area,many people are opposed to the idea particulary older people they thinkthat the community will be cut in half by the new road and crossing the proposed road will be very difficult. Amanda Cooper Melanie Ward Jason Jones
